title: MD
biography: Rahul Bose is an Indian actor and athlete who works in Hindi films. Bose is the president of Rugby India.
aiSummary: Anuradha Bose is a pediatric infections specialist with an H-index of 110 at Infectious Disease (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet Global Health, The Lancet, BMJ Global Health. Based in India.
